description:
A simple and sleek Flickr app for your webOS device. 

FEATURES:
• View your Photostream
• Upload Photos to Flickr
• Search for Photos, 
• View interesting Photos, 
• Download, Share or Tweet Images
• View your Contacts photos
• View your Favorite Photos
• Viewing & Add comments to pictures.

NEW IN 1.2.2
• Added 'Just Type' launch and Search Support for webOS 2.0+
• Added ability to set default Upload Photoset in the Preferences
• See "What's" New in the In-App Help Menu for more details about newly added features and bug fixes

REVIEWS:
• "If you’re a Flickr user then this app is a no-brainer..." - webOSroundup.com
• "Another amazing from these folks …" - Jerry M
• "This is an excellent Flickr Companion… " - Jeremy B

SUPPORT/FEEDBACK:

As always, your 5-star ratings and reviews keep the updates coming! So don't forget to tap that 'review' button & leave a review in the app catalog
